text: Bathi kwakufika isiBhalo31 kubo, sivela kuAllâh, singqina eso sikubo nangona kwakumathuba angaphambili babehleli becela kuAllâh ukuba Abanike uloyiso32 phezu kwabo bangakholwayo, kodwakwathi kwakufika oko bakwaziyo basuka bala ukukholwa kuko. Ke kaloku isiqalekiso sika- Allâh masibe phezu kwabangakholwayo
